Title: Requires renewable energy data resources provided by NYSERDA to include mapping of certain capital projects with a value of greater than one million dollars
Summary: Requires renewable energy data resources provided by NYSERDA to include mapping of certain capital projects with a value of greater than one million dollars for purposes of providing public information on the viability of siting of solar energy arrays, major renewable energy facilities, or major electric transmission facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง1912, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring renewable energy data resources to include mapping of certain capital projects
